message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it! I'm starting the offer at $150, but I'm open to discussing a fair price. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I understand that $120 is your budget, but I can't go that low. My minimum is $130, and I believe the value of this product justifies that price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand that you think the product is worth $130, but I'm not sure I agree. I'm willing to pay up to $110, which is a bit higher than my initial offer. Can you meet me at this price?
